page.title: 07PRIMARY SCHOOL SKEGNESS
page.content:
In Lincolnshire the education system is split into 3 main parts. 1.Infant and Junior..pupils 5-11 years. 2.Secondary..pupils 11-16(some 18) years. 3.Further Education..no age limits.
Primary schools are in a process of change from a formal system to a much more outward looking system which still encompasses formal and traditional values.The aim is to give children a sound {basic numeracy and { literacy}foundation but also to encourage investigative and imaginative work.The recent introduction of simple{micro-computers into the class-room has made this easier.Work based on adventure programs and basic{information { handling }skills is appearing.
